About

Advisory Board & Council

Advisory Board

The DOAJ Advisory Board was elected by the community to provide advice and expertise to the DOAJ Team. The Board is governed by Terms of reference. All board members started in August 2019.

Council

The DOAJ Council was elected by the community to provide advice and expertise to the Advisory Board and assist them with their recommendations to the DOAJ Team. The Council is governed by Terms of reference. All Council members started in September 2019 unless otherwise stated.
